name: Power Defender
description:
Power Defender is a fast-paced, matching-based, survival game where you swap between the cardinal directions to try to manage the endless waves of space-goblins.

Do you have what it takes to be a Power Defender?

Background:

Power Defender was made by Spring Roll Studios, a student team at UCF working to make games for Limbitless Solutions. With this in mind the game is designed to be played with a limited number of button inputs and without mouse use. It was those constraints that inspired our unconventional shooter design and bionic arm-based characters.

Game Credits:

  • John Matthew Mercer - Executive Producer
  • Thi Tran - Studio Creative Director
  • Sage Gullo - Project Creative Director,  Animator
  • Neri St.Charles - Project Producer, Tech Staff
  • Matt Bolles - Tech Lead
  • Christopher Couto - Tech Staff
  • Mattisse Chevere - Art Lead / 3D Artist
  • Alex Cisneros - 2D Artist

Power Defender is a student project so any feedback is welcome!
